text.0: this very mighty one whom gods commission the conqueror of cars ever triumphant.
text.1: swift fleet to battle with uninjured fellies even tārkṣya for our weal will we call hither.
text.2: as though we offered up our gifts to indra may we ascend him as a ship for safety.
text.3: like the two wide worlds broad deep farextended may we be safe both when he comes and leaves you.
text.4: he who with might the five lands hath pervaded like sūrya with his lustre and the waters.
text.5: his strength wins hundreds thousands none avert it as the young maid repelleth not her lover.
